name: Lexicon (itch)
description:
The idea of this game is to defeat your enemy, while watching it's behavior change as you rename it.

How to play:

  1. Select a letter to change
  2. Choose whether you want to move it forward or backwards one
  3. You will attack the enemy, followed by the enemy doing something based on its name

Tip:

If a letter is brought backwards from 'A' or forwards from 'Z' it is removed
